name: Terminal 1.4
description:
Every game I released on itch.io is shit compared to this, I actually put quite a bit of effort into this. Well I know that this game is shit but its basically my first actual game. This game will take you around 4hrs to beat.

Credits:

Game by Kibble_ / Luis Perez

Music by Yubatake, AVGVSTA and Spring

There awesome music can be found on https://opengameart.org/

The Creator's initials are on the ASCII art, if there initials are not there, it means that the creators are unknown.

Let me know if there are any bugs

Changelog:

1.2.1: 

- Fixed bug in Dire Woods where the player can go forever.
1.3.0:

- Improved on the Final Boss, the boss now has two phases, and is a little bit easier.

-  Minor dialogue tweaks were made. 

- Added an icon to the Terminal.exe. 

- The level cap is now 50. 

- Hopefully fixed the Save & Quit option, though not a confirmed fix.

1.3.1:

-  Minor dialogue tweaks were made. 

1.4.0:

- Added a mute volume option in title screen

- Removed save and continue, and save and quit option upon death.

- Changed the name of a level to a 'Zone' in case of confusion

- Added 'Ascension mode' once the game is complete

- Removed Game Icon due to school restrictions
